name: Lakeview Cabin 2
description:
"This time, the terror is real..."

Play as four companions as they use anything they can find to survive against terrifying foes. Explore the possibilities of emergent gameplay and dive deeper into the lore of the Lakeview. Just make sure you have a plan before the night falls...

Episode 1: A family gathers at their summer house, where sinister forces are waiting for them...
Survive the ensuing days with clever traps and careful planning.

Episode 2: A cult film convention is happening at a local hotel. Unbeknown to the actors meeting their biggest fans, a hidden threat is looming...
Find the secret murderer from the crowd, or take down everyone.

Episode 3: A classic tv-series holds a dark secret. What really happened at the studio, and what became of a fan favourite actor?
Use whatever you can to fight enemies across multiple timelines.

Episode 4: A group of apocalypse survivors venture forth into the wasteland, for a last ditch effort to stop the evil.
Travel across the map, while navigating all the dangers the world of Lakeview has to offer.

-Sequel to Lakeview Cabin Collection (2015)
-Includes a remake of the original Lakeview Cabin flash game!
-All four episodes are in the game, with bonus modes for all of them!
-Play alone or with your friend! 2-player CO-OP available from the start!
